__init__(self, val=0, next=None):\r\n#         self.val = val\r\n#         self.next = next\r\n\r\ndef mergeTwoLists(list1: Optional[ListNode], list2: Optional[ListNode]) -> Optional[ListNode]:\r\n    # if either list is empty \r\n    if not list1:\r\n        return list2\r\n    elif not list2:\r\n        return list1\r\n    \r\n    head1, head2 = list1, list2\r\n    nodes = []\r\n    \r\n    # break down linkedlists into a regular list\r\n    while True:\r\n        if head1:\r\n            nodes.append(head1.val)\r\n            head1 = head1.next\r\n        \r\n        if head2:\r\n            nodes.append(head2.val)\r\n            head2 = head2.next\r\n\r\n        if not head1 and not head2:\r\n            break\r\n\r\n    # build up sorted linkedlist from sorted list\r\n    sorted_nodes = sorted(nodes)\r\n    \r\n    merged_list = ListNode(sorted_nodes[0])\r\n    merged_head = merged_list\r\n    \r\n    for node in sorted_nodes[1:]:\r\n        temp = ListNode(node)\r\n        merged_list.next = temp\r\n        merged_list = temp\r\n\r\n    return merged_head\n","language":"py","meta":""},"children":[{"type":"element","tag":"pre","props":{},"children":[{"type":"element","tag":"code","props":{"__ignoreMap":""},"children":[{"type":"element","tag":"span","props":{"class":"line","line":1},"children":[{"type":"element","tag":"span","props":{"class":"ct-188924"},"children":[{"type":"text","value":"#
